name: Himalaya Natural Glow Saffron Face Wash
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from India. Himalaya’s Natural Glow Saffron Face Wash is a soap-free, formulation that brightens and rejuvenates your skin, giving it a healthy, natural glow. With the goodness of Saffron, proven for its complexion enhancing properties, this face wash gives you a visibly glowing and clearer complexion. Pomegranate known to nourish, Mint cools, and Cucumber help soothe your skin, leaving it refreshed.
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from India.

name: Himalaya Pollution Detox Charcoal Face Wash
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from India. Pollution Detox Charcoal Face Wash is infused with Coconut Charcoal powder and goodness of Green Tea. This face wash with the adsorption properties of Coconut Charcoal powder helps remove dirt and reduce oiliness. The anti-oxidant properties of Green Tea helps purify skin, leaving it clean and refreshed.
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from India.
 
Pollution Detox Charcoal Face Wash is infused with Coconut Charcoal powder and goodness of Green Tea. This face wash with the adsorption properties of Coconut Charcoal powder helps remove dirt and reduce oiliness. name: Pond's Pure Detox Face Wash
description:
With activated charcoal, this deep cleanser extracts out pollutants and impurities, leaving skin so pure, it glows! Urban atmospheres are plagued with dust and pollutants that are quite harmful to your skin. These particles settle on your skin and penetrate the surface causing possible long-term damage while also darkening your skin cells from the deep within. This can cause rashes, acne, eczema, dryness, dark spots and even premature aging.  To help remove all traces of pollution, dirt and impurities and give your skin a fresh, clean and glowing complexion, use the Pond's Pure White facewash it happens to be one of the best face washes for women to restore radiant looks. Designed with activated Charcoal technology this gentle face wash works for all skin types. It helps uncover your natural radiance by working on the outside removing dead skin cells and going deeper to clean out all other impurities in your skin. The unique formula used in this face wash features activated charcoal that work from deep within your pores to the surface to give you clear, fairer-looking skin that’s radiant with a natural glow. This ingredient acts as a magnet that draws out the pollution, dirt and dust from your skin allowing it to be cleansed thoroughly.

name: Pond's Face Wash Bright Beauty
description:
Is your true complexion lost or hidden? Over time dead skin cells accumulate on your skin, hiding your true complexion, making you look dull and dark. New and improved Pond’s White Beauty Face Wash. 1st ever facewash with Double Brightening Action to renew your complexion every day. Now get the clinically proven benefits with Pond’s. Your complexion is hidden under layers of dead skin cells and pollution. Pond’s White Beauty Face Wash with advanced vitamin B3+ formula will cleanse your skin and gives you spotless glow. It goes deep to clean dead skin cells and uncovers millions of new cells- so that you can get your hidden complexion back. Infused with vitamin B3+, it removes layers of dead skin cells and it strengthens skin’s natural renewal process, revealing new bright cells. Renew your complexion with everyday wash. Clinically proven to give you glow from the first wash. Its double brightness action wipes out dead skin cells so that you can say goodbye to skin dullness. This helps bring out the complexion locked inside which shows clearly after every use of Pond’s White Beauty Facewash. This is truly your solution to a spot less and glowing skin. Dead skin removal  Spot less glow  Fades dark spots  Advanced B3+ formula  Clinically proven facewash  With Advanced Vitamin B3

name: Pond's Facewash Oil Control
description:
Crafted especially for oily skin   With silica bead technology   Can be used for all skin types   Leaves skin soft, with non-oily fresh glow   Ideal for all year round use   Suitable for oily skinFor skin that faces a constant problem of oil secretion making you look dull, Pond’s oil control is an effective way to start the morning and go through the day. It helps remove oil and grime off your face. Women with oily or combition skin tend to look dull due to the oil secretion - Pond’s oil control is tough on the oil but gentle on the skin. The silica gel bead technology helps giving you an oil free glow. Feel the freshness with Pond’s oil control. Get rid of oil and avoid dull and tired looking skin. Let your skin feel energized from deep within with Pond’s oil control. Pond’s oil control comes with the promise of no wash-up no touch required. Pond’s oil control facewash is created by Pond’s - the experts in skincare products. It’s gel based formula with silica bead technology is created keeping in mind the modern millennial with her busy schedule. If you want the perfect no wash-up no touch-up - all day fresh look - grab your pack of Pond’s oil control facewash today, recommended to use twice a day (morning and night) for best results.

name: Clean & Clear Foaming Face Wash
description:
Clean & Clear Foaming Face Wash is a specially designed face wash for oily skin. Meant for daily use, the oily skin face wash is formulated with ingredients that work to remove dirt and excess oil with its foaming action.• Remove excess oil, while its special ingredients help prevent pimples. • Its liquid formula cleans deep without causing dryness. • A suitable facewash for both Men and Women  • Specially designed for oily skin. • Gentle enough to use every day, for clean and clear skin that glows.    How to use:• Apply a small amount on wet palm and work into rich lather.  • Gently massage onto face, avoiding the eye area.   • Rinse off thoroughly.   • Use twice daily for skin that's beautiful, clean and clear

name: Glow & Lovely Instaglow Facewash with Multivitamins
description:
Presenting Glow & Lovely Instaglow face wash (Formerly known as Fair & Lovely) Enriched with multivitamins like Vitamin B3, C & E, to give you an instant glow. Deep* cleanses to remove dirt and pollution from deep* within your skin with every wash. Exfoliates to remove dead skin cells and helps remove germs to unclog pores with every wash. Washes away skin impurities and boosts skin defence. The facewash effectively cleanses your skin to give you an instant glow. Specially formulated with glycerine, myristic acids, and enriched with multivitamins, the face wash ensures a bright glowing clear skin. Its benefits are: 1. Clear brighter face 2. Clean instant Glow 3. Soft and smoother feel for a healthy look 4. Boosts skin defence. It is specially formulated to suit all skin types. The Glow & Lovely has been evaluated in clinical and consumer tests for the claimed benefits with excellent results that have been certified and endorsed by internationally renowned dermatologists. For best results, use twice a day in the morning and evening. For a good skin care regime use Glow & Lovely Advanced Multivitamin Face Cream afterwards.

name: Dabur Gulabari Premium Rose Water
description:
Invigorate, refresh and cleanse your skin with the goodness of natural rose extracts! Dabur Gulabari Rose Water is a natural toner that cleanses your skin from deep within ridding it of any dirt, grime or foreign bodies that can damage your skin. Apply it directly on the skin or mix it with a face pack to get a glowing & radiant rose like skin. It is  natural, safe and effective remedy for all skin types. Why Dabur Gulabari Rose Water?  •  pure & natural  • No added preservatives • Natural skin toner  • Cleanses, refreshes & cools the skin • Good for all skin types  Directions: • Dab it directly on the face with a cotton pad or mix it in your face pack/ubtan • Rinse your face with water  • Get glowing & radiant rose like skin.

description:

This deep cleanser extracts out pollutants and impurities, leaving skin so clean and pure, that it glows!Ingredients: Myristic acid, glycerine, palmitic acid, stearic acid, charcoal powder, carbon perfume, water, propylene glycol, glycerol, potassium hydroxide, lauric acid, disodium EDTA, niacinamide.

name: Pond's Face Wash Scrub
description:
Its Skin Exfoliating and Revitalising System contains two kinds of microbeads: - Scrubbing Beads - white beads help to deep clean gently, removing dead skin cells and helping prevent blackheads and pimples. Nourishing Beads - orange beads with vitamin C help to nourish the skin Its pH-balanced cleanser formula deep cleanses without destroying the moisture balance of your skin Clean, bright, healthy skin, free from blackheads and pimples.

name: Pond's Face Wash Daily
description:
New Pond's Daily Face Wash is designed to give your skin a fresh feel every day. This face wash is designed for all skin types. Active cleansing system cleanses thoroughly & gently. Cares for your skin as it cleans more gently than a soap can. Menthol & Peppermint fusion helps to leave your skin fresh and renewed. This Ultra-mild face wash is perfect for everyday exfoliation. Get fresh skin every day with the new Pond's Daily Face Wash.
New Pond's Daily Face Wash is designed to give your skin a fresh feel every day. This face wash is designed for all skin types. Active cleansing system cleanses thoroughly & gently. Cares for your skin as it cleans more gently than a soap can. Menthol & Peppermint fusion helps to leave your skin fresh and renewed. This Ultra-mild face wash is perfect for everyday exfoliation. Get fresh skin every day with the new Pond's Daily Face Wash.

name: Earth Beauty & You Aloe Vera Face Wash
description:
Cleanup Starts Here | ideal for dull, grimy, patchy skin healing properties, that help to fight the damaging effects of pollution and UV rays on the skin. It deeply moisturizes the skin without leaving it greasy, and as such makes for a smooth and light face cleanser so your skin stays fresh.It likewise improves the flexibility of the skin and levels out its tone restoring the skin's natural pH balance. Ingredients: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Cocodiethanol Amide, Carbomer,Sodium Hydroxide, Salicylic Acid, EDTA, Allantoin, Aloe Vera Extract, PG-40 Hydrogenated, Castor Oil, Triclosan, DMDM Hydantoin, Sodium Chloride, Color, Fragrance Oil.
Cleanup Starts Here | ideal for dull, grimy, patchy skin
 
healing properties, that help to fight the damaging effects of pollution and UV rays on the skin. It deeply moisturizes the skin without leaving it greasy, and as such makes for a smooth and light face cleanser so your skin stays fresh.

name: Parachute SkinPure Orange Brightening Face Wash Anti Pimple
description:
Brand: Parachute SkinPure    Product Benefits: Anti-Pimple, Bright & Glowing Skin    Item Form: Gel    Material Type Free: Paraben, Sulphate Free    Skin Type: All Skin Types    Liquid Volume: 50 gm    Special Feature: Contains Orange            • Parachute SkinPure Orange Brightening Facewash: Parachute SkinPure Orange Brightening Facewash is an innovative skincare solution enriched with the goodness of Orange extract.    • Pimple-Free Skin and Bright Complexion: Regular use of Parachute SkinPure Orange Brightening Facewash helps to achieve pimple-free skin and a brighter complexion. The powerful combination of Orange extract effectively targets acne-causing bacteria, controls excess oil production, and promotes a clearer, more radiant complexion.    • Innovative Anti-Pimple Formula: Parachute SkinPure Orange Brightening Facewash is an innovation in skincare, specially formulated to address the dual concerns of pimples and dullness. Its unique formula helps to control pimples while brightening the skin, providing comprehensive care for a healthier, more luminous complexion.    • No Harmful Chemicals: This product is free from harmful chemicals like silicones, parabens, sulfates, and phthalates. Its gentle formula ensures that your hair receives pure, natural care without any potentially damaging ingredients.    • Safe for All Skin Types: Dermatologically tested, this facewash is suitable for all skin types. Its gentle formulation ensures effective cleansing without stripping the skin of its natural moisture, making it ideal for daily use to maintain clear, bright, and healthy-looking skin.    • How to Use: Wet your face, create a lather, gently massage Parachute SkinPure Orange Face Wash onto your face and neck, then rinse off. In case of contact with the eyes, rinse with water immediately.

name: Pierre Cardin Cleansing Gel
description:

Thanks to its alcohol-free, paraben-free and soap-free miraculous formula, Pierre Cardin Cosmetic’s Purifying Facial Cleansing Gel will be your skin’s best friend. name: Parachute SkinPure Goat Milk Brightening Face Wash Glow
description:
Brand: Parachute SkinPure Product Benefits: Bright & Glowing Skin, Prevents Dull Skin    Item Form: Gel Material Type Free: Paraben, Sulphate Free Skin Type: All Skin Types    Liquid Volume: 100 gm Special Feature: Contains Goat Milk • Parachute SkinPure Goat Milk Brightening Facewash: Parachute SkinPure Goat Milk Brightening Facewash is an innovative skincare solution enriched with the goodness of goat milk. • Goodness of Goat Milk: This facewash is enriched with Goat Milk, a renowned ingredient known for its brightening and glowing properties. Goat Milk is rich in vitamins, minerals, and fatty acids that nourish the skin, helping to improve its texture, tone, and overall appearance. • Glowing Skin and Bright Complexion: Regular use of Parachute SkinPure Goat Milk Brightening Facewash helps to achieve glowing skin and a brighter complexion. The nourishing properties of Goat Milk help to hydrate the skin, improve its elasticity, and enhance its natural radiance, leaving it looking healthy, vibrant, and youthful. • No Harmful Chemicals: This product is free from harmful chemicals like silicones, parabens, sulfates, and phthalates. Its gentle formula ensures that your hair receives pure, natural care without any potentially damaging ingredients. • Safe for All Skin Types: Dermatologically tested, this facewash is suitable for all skin types. Its gentle formulation ensures effective cleansing without stripping the skin of its natural moisture, making it ideal for daily use to maintain clear, bright, and healthy-looking skin. • How to Use: Wet your face, create a lather, gently massage Parachute SkinPure Goat Milk Face Wash onto your face and neck, then rinse off. In case of contact with the eyes, rinse with water immediately.

name: Clean & Clear Foaming Face Wash
description:
Clean & Clear Foaming Face Wash is a specially designed face wash for oily skin. Meant for daily use, the oily skin face wash is formulated with ingredients that work to remove dirt and excess oil with its foaming action. • Remove excess oil, while its special ingredients help prevent pimples. • Its liquid formula cleans deep without causing dryness. • A suitable facewash for both Men and Women • Specially designed for oily skin. • Gentle enough to use every day, for clean and clear skin that glows.    How to use: • Apply a small amount on wet palm and work into rich lather. • Gently massage onto face, avoiding the eye area. • Rinse off thoroughly. • Use twice daily for skin that's beautiful, clean and clear

name: Neutrogena Spot Controlling Facial Wash
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from United States. Neutrogena Spot Controlling Facial Wash is a targeted skincare solution designed to help prevent and control acne breakouts while promoting clear and healthy skin. This 200 ml bottle of facial wash is carefully formulated to effectively cleanse your skin, remove impurities, and address the issues associated with acne-prone skin.
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from United States.

name: Garnier Skin Active Micellar Cleansing Water
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from France. Discover the cleansing power of Garnier Skin Active Micellar Cleansing Water, a 125 ml bottle of gentle yet effective makeup remover and facial cleanser. Garnier, a brand known for its commitment to skincare innovation, offers you a micellar water that simplifies your daily cleansing routine. This micellar water effortlessly removes makeup, dirt, and impurities, leaving your skin refreshed, clean, and hydrated.
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from France.

name: L'Oréal Paris Pure Clay Detox Face Wash
description:

name: Garnier Bright Complete Vitamin C Face Wash
description:
Elevate your skincare routine with Garnier Light White Complete Face Wash, a 100-gram tube of gentle and effective face cleanser. Garnier, a trusted name in skincare, brings you a specialized formula designed to help cleanse, brighten, and nourish your skin, leaving you with a fresh and radiant complexion. Elevate your skincare routine with the triple-action formula of Garnier Light White Complete Face Wash and reveal brighter, nourished, and revitalized skin. Trust in Garnier to help you put your best face forward.
